00046 
00047 Session::Session(Comm *comm, PropertiesPtr &cfg, SessionCallback *cb)
00048   : m_comm(comm), m_verbose(false), m_silent(false), m_state(STATE_JEOPARDY),
00049     m_session_callback(cb) {
00050   uint16_t master_port;
00051   String master_host;
00052 
00053   HT_TRY("getting config values",
00054     m_verbose = cfg->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose");
00055     m_silent = cfg->get_bool("Hypertable.Silent");
00056     master_host = cfg->get_str("Hyperspace.Master.Host");
00057     master_port = cfg->get_i16("Hyperspace.Master.Port");
00058     m_grace_period = cfg->get_i32("Hyperspace.GracePeriod");
00059     m_lease_interval = cfg->get_i32("Hyperspace.Lease.Interval"));
00060 
00061   m_timeout_ms = m_lease_interval * 2;
00062 
00063   HT_EXPECT(InetAddr::initialize(&m_master_addr, master_host.c_str(),
00064             master_port), Error::BAD_DOMAIN_NAME);
00065 
00066   boost::xtime_get(&m_expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00067   xtime_add_millis(m_expire_time, m_grace_period);
00068 
00069   m_keepalive_handler_ptr = new ClientKeepaliveHandler(comm, cfg, this);
00070 }
00071 
00072 Session::~Session() {
00073   m_keepalive_handler_ptr->destroy_session();
00074 }

00076 
00077 uint64_t
00078 Session::open(ClientHandleStatePtr &handle_state, CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr,
00079               Timer *timer) {
00080   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00081   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00082 
00083   handle_state->handle = 0;
00084   handle_state->sequencer = 0;
00085   handle_state->lock_status = 0;
00086   uint32_t open_flags = handle_state->open_flags;
00087 
00088   if ((open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED)
00089     handle_state->lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
00090   else if ((open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE)
00091     handle_state->lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
00092   else
00093     handle_state->lock_mode = 0;
00094 
00095  try_again:
00096   if (!wait_for_safe())
00097     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00098 
00099   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00100   if (error == Error::OK) {
00101     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00102       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get());
00103       HT_THROWF(error,  "Hyperspace 'open' error, name=%s flags=0x%x events=0x"
00104                 "%x", handle_state->normal_name.c_str(), open_flags,
00105                 handle_state->event_mask);
00106     }
00107     else {
00108       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00109       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00110       handle_state->handle = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00111       decode_byte(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00112       handle_state->lock_generation = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00114       m_keepalive_handler_ptr->register_handle(handle_state);
00115       HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Open succeeded session="
00116                   << m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_session_id()
00117                   << ", name=" << handle_state->normal_name
00118                   << ", handle=" << handle_state->handle << ", flags=" << open_flags
00119                   << ", event_mask=" << handle_state->event_mask << HT_END;
00120       return handle_state->handle;
00121     }
00122   }
00123 
00124   state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00125   goto try_again;
00126 
00127 }

00130 uint64_t
00131 Session::open(const std::string &name, uint32_t flags,
00132               HandleCallbackPtr &callback, Timer *timer) {
00133   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state(new ClientHandleState());
00134   std::vector<Attribute> empty_attrs;
00135 
00136   handle_state->open_flags = flags;
00137   handle_state->event_mask = (callback) ? callback->get_event_mask() : 0;
00138   handle_state->callback = callback;
00139   normalize_name(name, handle_state->normal_name);
00140 
00141   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_open_request(handle_state->normal_name,
00142                       flags, callback, empty_attrs));
00143 
00144   return open(handle_state, cbuf_ptr, timer);
00145 }

00147 
00148 uint64_t
00149 Session::create(const std::string &name, uint32_t flags,
00150                 HandleCallbackPtr &callback,
00151                 std::vector<Attribute> &init_attrs, Timer *timer) {
00152   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state(new ClientHandleState());
00153 
00154   handle_state->open_flags = flags | OPEN_FLAG_CREATE | OPEN_FLAG_EXCL;
00155   handle_state->event_mask = (callback) ? callback->get_event_mask() : 0;
00156   handle_state->callback = callback;
00157   normalize_name(name, handle_state->normal_name);
00158 
00159   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_open_request(handle_state->normal_name,
00160                       handle_state->open_flags, callback, init_attrs));
00161 
00162   return open(handle_state, cbuf_ptr, timer);
00163 }

00169 void Session::close(uint64_t handle, Timer *timer) {
00170   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00171   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00172   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_close_request(handle));
00173 
00174  try_again:
00175   if (!wait_for_safe())
00176     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00177 
00178   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00179   if (error == Error::OK) {
00180     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00181       HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00182                "Hyperspace 'close' error");
00183   }
00184   else {
00185     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00186     goto try_again;
00187   }
00188 }

00248 bool Session::exists(const std::string &name, Timer *timer) {
00249   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00250   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00251   String normal_name;
00252 
00253   normalize_name(name, normal_name);
00254 
00255   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_exists_request(normal_name));
00256 
00257  try_again:
00258   if (!wait_for_safe())
00259     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00260 
00261   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00262   if (error == Error::OK) {
00263     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00264       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00265                 "Hyperspace 'exists' error, name=%s", normal_name.c_str());
00266     }
00267     else {
00268       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00269       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00270       uint8_t bval = decode_byte(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00271       return (bval == 0) ? false : true;
00272     }
00273   }
00274 
00275   state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00276   goto try_again;
00277 }

00282 void Session::attr_set(uint64_t handle, const std::string &name,
00283                        const void *value, size_t value_len, Timer *timer) {
00284   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00285   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00286   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_attr_set_request(handle, name, value,
00287                       value_len));
00288 
00289  try_again:
00290   if (!wait_for_safe())
00291     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00292 
00293   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00294   if (error == Error::OK) {
00295     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00296       ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00297       String fname = "UNKNOWN";
00298       if (m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00299         fname = handle_state->normal_name.c_str();
00300       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00301                 "Problem setting attribute '%s' of hyperspace file '%s'",
00302                 name.c_str(), fname.c_str());
00303     }
00304     return;
00305   }
00306 
00307   state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00308   goto try_again;
00309 }

00311 
00312 void
00313 Session::attr_get(uint64_t handle, const std::string &name,
00314                   DynamicBuffer &value, Timer *timer) {
00315   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00316   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00317   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_attr_get_request(handle, name));
00318 
00319  try_again:
00320   if (!wait_for_safe())
00321     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00322 
00323   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00324   if (error == Error::OK) {
00325     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00326       ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00327       String fname = "UNKNOWN";
00328       if (m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00329         fname = handle_state->normal_name.c_str();
00330       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00331                 "Problem getting attribute '%s' of hyperspace file '%s'",
00332                 name.c_str(), fname.c_str());
00333     }
00334     else {
00335       uint32_t attr_val_len = 0;
00336       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00337       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00338       void *attr_val = decode_bytes32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain,
00339                                       &attr_val_len);
00340       value.clear();
00341       value.ensure(attr_val_len+1);
00342       value.add_unchecked(attr_val, attr_val_len);
00343       // nul-terminate to make caller's lives easier
00344       *value.ptr = 0;
00345     }
00346   }
00347   else {
00348     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00349     goto try_again;
00350   }
00351 }

00354 Session::attr_exists(uint64_t handle, const std::string& name, Timer *timer)

00356   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;

00358 
00359   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_attr_exists_request(handle, name));
00360 
00361  try_again:
00362   if (!wait_for_safe())
00363     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00364 
00365   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00366   if (error == Error::OK) {
00367     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00368       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00369                 "Hyperspace 'attr_exists' error, name=%s", name.c_str());
00370     }
00371     else {
00372       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00373       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;

00414 void Session::attr_list(uint64_t handle, vector<String> &anames, Timer *timer) {
00415    DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00416    Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00417    CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_attr_list_request(handle));
00418 
00419   try_again:
00420    if (!wait_for_safe())
00421      HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00422 
00423    int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00424    if (error == Error::OK) {
00425      if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00426        ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00427        String fname = "UNKNOWN";
00428        if (m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00429          fname = handle_state->normal_name.c_str();
00430        HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00431                  "Problem getting list of attributes of hyperspace file '%s'",
00432                  fname.c_str());
00433      }
00434      else {
00435        const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00436        size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00437 
00438        uint32_t num_attributes = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00439 
00440        for (uint32_t k = 0; k < num_attributes; k++) {
00441          String attrname;
00442          attrname = decode_vstr(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00443          anames.push_back(attrname);
00444        }
00445      }
00446    }
00447    else {
00448      state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00449      goto try_again;
00450    }
00451 
00452 }

00454 
00455 void
00456 Session::readdir(uint64_t handle, std::vector<DirEntry> &listing,
00457                  Timer *timer) {
00458   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00459   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00460   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_readdir_request(handle));
00461 
00462  try_again:
00463   if (!wait_for_safe())
00464     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00465 
00466   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00467   if (error == Error::OK) {
00468     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr)) {
00469       HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00470                "Hyperspace 'readdir' error");
00471     }
00472     else {
00473       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00474       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00475       uint32_t entry_cnt;
00476       DirEntry dentry;
00477       try {
00478         entry_cnt = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00479       }
00480       catch (Exception &e) {
00481         HT_THROW2(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, e, "");
00482       }
00483       listing.clear();
00484       for (uint32_t i=0; i<entry_cnt; i++) {
00485         try {
00486           decode_dir_entry(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain, dentry);
00487         }
00488         catch (Exception &e) {
00489           HT_THROW2F(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, e,
00490                      "Problem decoding entry %d of READDIR return packet", i);
00491         }
00492         listing.push_back(dentry);
00493       }
00494     }
00495   }
00496   else {
00497     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00498     goto try_again;
00499   }
00500 }

00503 
00504 void
00505 Session::lock(uint64_t handle, uint32_t mode, LockSequencer *sequencerp,
00506               Timer *timer) {
00507   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00508   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00509   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_lock_request(handle, mode, false));
00510   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00511   uint32_t status = 0;
00512 
00513   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00514     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "");
00515 
00516   if (handle_state->lock_status != 0)
00517     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_ALREADY_LOCKED, "");
00518 
00519  try_again:
00520   if (!wait_for_safe())
00521     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00522 
00523   {
00524     ScopedLock lock(handle_state->mutex);
00525     sequencerp->mode = mode;
00526     sequencerp->name = handle_state->normal_name;
00527     handle_state->sequencer = sequencerp;
00528   }
00529 
00530   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00531   if (error == Error::OK) {
00532     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00533       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00534                 "Hyperspace 'lock' error, name='%s'",
00535                 handle_state->normal_name.c_str());
00536     else {
00537       ScopedLock lock(handle_state->mutex);
00538       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00539       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00540       handle_state->lock_mode = mode;
00541       try {
00542         status = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00543 
00544         if (status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00545           sequencerp->generation = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00546           handle_state->lock_generation = sequencerp->generation;
00547           handle_state->lock_status = LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED;
00548         }
00549         else {
00550           assert(status == LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00551           handle_state->lock_status = LOCK_STATUS_PENDING;
00552           while (handle_state->lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_PENDING)
00553             handle_state->cond.wait(lock);
00554           if (handle_state->lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_CANCELLED)
00555             HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_REQUEST_CANCELLED, "");
00556           assert(handle_state->lock_status == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED);
00557         }
00558       }
00559       catch (Exception &e) {
00560         HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, "lock response decode error");
00561       }
00562     }
00563   }
00564   else {
00565     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00566     goto try_again;
00567   }
00568 
00569 }
00570 
00571 
00572 void
00573 Session::try_lock(uint64_t handle, uint32_t mode, uint32_t *statusp,
00574                   LockSequencer *sequencerp, Timer *timer) {
00575   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00576   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00577   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_lock_request(handle, mode, true));
00578   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00579 
00580   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00581     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "");
00582 
00583   if (handle_state->lock_status != 0)
00584     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_ALREADY_LOCKED, "");
00585 
00586  try_again:
00587   if (!wait_for_safe())
00588     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00589 
00590   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00591   if (error == Error::OK) {
00592     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00593       HT_THROWF((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00594                 "Hyperspace 'try_lock' error, name='%s'",
00595                 handle_state->normal_name.c_str());
00596     else {
00597       ScopedLock lock(handle_state->mutex);
00598       const uint8_t *decode_ptr = event_ptr->payload + 4;
00599       size_t decode_remain = event_ptr->payload_len - 4;
00600       try {
00601         *statusp = decode_i32(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00602 
00603         if (*statusp == LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED) {
00604           sequencerp->generation = decode_i64(&decode_ptr, &decode_remain);
00605           sequencerp->mode = mode;
00606           sequencerp->name = handle_state->normal_name;
00607           handle_state->lock_mode = mode;
00608           handle_state->lock_status = LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED;
00609           handle_state->lock_generation = sequencerp->generation;
00610           handle_state->sequencer = 0;
00611         }
00612       }
00613       catch (Exception &e) {
00614         HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, "try_lock response decode error");
00615       }
00616     }
00617   }
00618   else {
00619     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00620     goto try_again;
00621   }
00622 
00623 }
00624 
00625 
00626 void Session::release(uint64_t handle, Timer *timer) {
00627   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00628   Hypertable::EventPtr event_ptr;
00629   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_release_request(handle));
00630   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00631 
00632   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00633     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "");
00634 
00635  try_again:
00636   if (!wait_for_safe())
00637     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00638 
00639   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00640   if (error == Error::OK) {
00641     ScopedLock lock(handle_state->mutex);
00642     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00643       HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr.get()),
00644                "Hyperspace 'release' error");
00645     handle_state->lock_status = 0;
00646     handle_state->cond.notify_all();
00647   }
00648   else {
00649     state_transition(Session::STATE_JEOPARDY);
00650     goto try_again;
00651   }
00652 
00653 }
00654 
00655 
00656 
00657 void
00658 Session::get_sequencer(uint64_t handle, LockSequencer *sequencerp,
00659                        Timer *timer) {
00660   ClientHandleStatePtr handle_state;
00661 
00662   if (!m_keepalive_handler_ptr->get_handle_state(handle, handle_state))
00663     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "");
00664 
00665   if (handle_state->lock_generation == 0)
00666     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_NOT_LOCKED, "");
00667 
00668   sequencerp->name = handle_state->normal_name;
00669   sequencerp->mode = handle_state->lock_mode;
00670   sequencerp->generation = handle_state->lock_generation;
00671 
00672 }
00673 
00674 
00677 void Session::check_sequencer(LockSequencer &sequencer, Timer *timer) {
00678   HT_WARN("CheckSequencer not implemented.");
00679 }
00680 
00681 
00684 int Session::status(Timer *timer) {
00685   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00686   EventPtr event_ptr;
00687   CommBufPtr cbuf_ptr(Protocol::create_status_request());
00688   int error = send_message(cbuf_ptr, &sync_handler, timer);
00689   if (error == Error::OK) {
00690     if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00691       error = (int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr);
00692   }
00693   return error;
00694 }
00695 
00696 
00697 int Session::state_transition(int state) {
00698   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00699   int old_state = m_state;
00700   m_state = state;
00701   if (m_state == STATE_SAFE) {
00702     m_cond.notify_all();
00703     if (m_session_callback && old_state == STATE_JEOPARDY)
00704       m_session_callback->safe();
00705   }
00706   else if (m_state == STATE_JEOPARDY) {
00707     if (m_session_callback && old_state == STATE_SAFE) {
00708       m_session_callback->jeopardy();
00709       boost::xtime_get(&m_expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00710       xtime_add_millis(m_expire_time, m_grace_period);
00711     }
00712   }
00713   else if (m_state == STATE_EXPIRED) {
00714     if (m_session_callback && old_state != STATE_EXPIRED)
00715       m_session_callback->expired();
00716     m_cond.notify_all();
00717   }
00718   return old_state;
00719 }
00720 
00721 
00722 int Session::get_state() {
00723   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00724   return m_state;
00725 }
00726 
00727 
00728 bool Session::expired() {
00729   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00730   boost::xtime now;
00731   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00732   if (xtime_cmp(m_expire_time, now) < 0)
00733     return true;
00734   return false;
00735 }
00736 
00737 
00738 bool Session::wait_for_connection(uint32_t max_wait_ms) {
00739   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00740   boost::xtime drop_time, now;
00741 
00742   boost::xtime_get(&drop_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00743   xtime_add_millis(drop_time, max_wait_ms);
00744 
00745   while (m_state != STATE_SAFE) {
00746     m_cond.timed_wait(lock, drop_time);
00747     boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00748     if (xtime_cmp(now, drop_time) >= 0)
00749       return false;
00750   }
00751   return true;
00752 }
00753 
00754 
00757 bool Session::wait_for_connection(Timer &timer) {
00758   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00759   boost::xtime drop_time;
00760 
00761   while (m_state != STATE_SAFE) {
00762     boost::xtime_get(&drop_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00763     xtime_add_millis(drop_time, timer.remaining());
00764     if (!m_cond.timed_wait(lock, drop_time))
00765       return false;
00766   }
00767   return true;
00768 }
00769 
00770 
00771 bool Session::wait_for_safe() {
00772   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00773   while (m_state != STATE_SAFE) {
00774     if (m_state == STATE_EXPIRED)
00775       return false;
00776     m_cond.wait(lock);
00777   }
00778   return true;
00779 }
00780 
00781 int
00782 Session::send_message(CommBufPtr &cbuf_ptr, DispatchHandler *handler,
00783                       Timer *timer) {
00784   int error;
00785   uint32_t timeout_ms = timer ? (time_t)timer->remaining() : m_timeout_ms;
00786 
00787   if ((error = m_comm->send_request(m_master_addr, timeout_ms, cbuf_ptr,
00788       handler)) != Error::OK) {
00789     std::string str;
00790     if (!m_silent)
00791       HT_WARNF("Comm::send_request to Hypertable.Master at %s failed - %s",
00792                m_master_addr.format().c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00793   }
00794   return error;
00795 }
00796 
00797 
00798 void Session::normalize_name(const String &name, String &normal) {
00799 
00800   if (name == "/") {
00801     normal = name;
00802     return;
00803   }
00804 
00805   normal = "";
00806   if (name[0] != '/')
00807     normal += "/";
00808 
00809   if (name.find('/', name.length()-1) == string::npos)
00810     normal += name;
00811   else
00812     normal += name.substr(0, name.length()-1);
00813 }
00814 
00818 HsCommandInterpreter *Session::create_hs_interpreter()
00819 {
00820   return new HsCommandInterpreter(this);
00821 }
